<br>

 

<p>In this Software Carpentry Workshop you will learn the <strong>Unix Shell, Git and R</strong>.</p><p>This example-driven <strong>two-day workshop</strong> will teach core computing skills that will help you be more productive and effective. We'll alternate short tutorials with hands-on practical exercises. Participants are encouraged to help one another and to apply what they are learning to their own research problems during the workshop.</p><p>See the workshop website for <strong>more details</strong>: <a href="https://lmu-osc.github.io/2024-10-10-LMU-Leo/">https://lmu-osc.github.io/2024-10-10-LMU-Leo/</a></p><p><strong>Instructors:</strong>  Alberto Villagran Asiares, Alp Kaan Aksu, Renata Topinkova, Po-chun Tseng</p><p>Registration is mandatory, and participation requires setting up the software in advance by following the provided instructions (a help desk session will also take place the day prior to the workshop). Please register only if you are available for the whole course.</p><ul style="list-style-type: square;"><li>
